Hey Dimitar,

In more recent versions of the boost library, they broke out =
the uniform_int and uniform_smallint classes.

Change "uniform_smallint" to=
 "uniform_int" on line 16 to correct this error.

Jason G.

oogroups.com, "dimitar.nedev" <nedev.dimitar@...> wrote:
